text: The men's freestyle 130 kilograms is a competition featured at the 2001 World Wrestling Championships, and was held at the Winter Sports Palace in Sofia, Bulgaria from 23 to 25 November 2001. ==Medalists== {|class="wikitable" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| |- |bgcolor="#cc9966"|Bronze|| |} ==Results== ;Legend *F — Won by fall ===Preliminary round=== ====Pool 1==== ====Pool 2==== ====Pool 3==== ====Pool 4==== ====Pool 5==== ====Pool 6==== ====Pool 7==== ===Knockout round=== ==References== Men's freestyle 99 kg
title: 2001 World Wrestling Championships – Men's freestyle 130 kg
